page.title: 08LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The area is policed by two counties and two divisions, 'K' division (Sandwell) and 'J' division (Dudley). Old Hill (Sandwell) is the only police station in the block, and it also houses the only law court. Forty to fifty officers work from this station of which ten are on duty at any one time. 'J' division works from the Dudley headquarters in the town centre at any one time there are usually four police officers on the beat, two panda cars, two quick response cars (zulu), and two dog handlers covering the area and beyond. This is a busy area to police and there are many small towns with busy main roads. The most common crime is theft followed by criminal damage. there are several court sittings each week, including domestic, magistrates and juvenile courts.
